title: How to View Profile Pictures on Instagram

steps.title: Launch a browser on your computer.
steps.content: Launch a browser on your computer. Navigate to instadp.online. There are other free web services you can use, but instadp is the most popular.

steps.title: Search for the user whose profile picture you wish to view.
steps.content: Search for the user whose profile picture you wish to view. Type the username into the search bar at the top. Click on the correct user.

steps.title: View the full-size profile picture.
steps.content: View the full-size profile picture. Click Full Size to view. Click Download to download the image. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Open the app store on your phone.
steps.content: Open the app store on your phone. This is the Google Play Store on an Android phone, and the App Store on an iPhone or iPad.

steps.title: Search for an Instagram profile pic viewer app.
steps.content: Search for an Instagram profile pic viewer app. Big Profile HD (Android) and IG Profile (iOS) are popular, free apps with minimal ads and HD quality. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Download the app.
steps.content: Download the app. Tap Get on an iPhone/iPad and Install on an Android. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Use the app.
steps.content: Use the app. Tap on the app to open. Search for the username you wish to view. Every app works slightly differently, but many will allow you to zoom and download the profile picture.
